pattern.name: Existencional count
pattern.description:
Count of occurrences of a specific value.
Null values are ignored as they are covered in null_ratio.
NOTE: THE SINGLE QUOTES ARE GOING TO CAUSE PROBLEMS -> ESCAPE IN PF.
NOTE: Is it beneficial to apply tf-idf? See: http://www.ipcsit.com/vol47/009-ICCTS2012-T049.pdf for modifications of tf-idf.
pattern.example: Whenever the dataset contains nominal attributes, the existencional quantifier belongs to the most important patterns. An example of datasets where existencional count excels: train dataset.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , sum(CASE @nominalColumn WHEN '@value' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "@columnName" FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @baseId, @baseDate, @baseTarget
